basic_info.description: I am an avid cyclist, camper, skier, motorcyclist, and hobby collector. I come from a varied career in IT support, from running keynotes for first ladies to designing entire domain architectures, and even cyber security. Through my time in IT support I discovered my most engaging projects where I had the freedom to build my solutions to complicated problems with scripting and automation. My best friends know that when I am interested in a subject I won't let it go for anything, and I apply this tenacity for learning and understanding to all my programming and projects. Ideally, my passion for programming brings me into a fulfilling position within a diverse organization with a mission of making a positive impact on the planet and the people within it.

projects.title: Codle
projects.description: Using vanilla JS, CSS, and HTML without the use of any library or APIs My team worked for 4 days to build a working Wordle recreation, Only this time with programming terms! We Learned a lot, and got to dip our toes into design and team management.

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: This was my first ever webpage, Utilizing JS, CSS, and HTML. It features a reactive table on the sales page, which works through DOM Manipulation

projects.title: Gallery Of Horns
projects.description: With Gallery Of Horns, I used React-Bootstrap to create my first interactive webpage, using Cards, Modals, Header, Footer, and more. This page displays cards for a number of horned animals and allows the user to click to favorite an animal, or view a modal with more information.
